name: Wavel AI
description: Wavel AI provides AI-powered solutions for creating and localizing multilingual video and audio content with dubbing, voiceovers, and subtitles.
longDescription: Wavel AI is an advanced AI-driven platform designed to simplify video and audio content creation, dubbing, and localization for creators, businesses, and educators. It leverages cutting-edge technologies like voice cloning, text-to-speech, and auto-subtitling to transform scripts or videos into multilingual, share-ready content. The platform eliminates the need for traditional studio setups, enabling users to produce high-quality content from any device. Wavel AI serves a global audience by offering solutions in over 40 languages, making it ideal for scaling content for international markets. Its mission is to break language barriers and enhance accessibility through seamless, AI-powered tools. The platform is particularly valuable for content creators, marketers, and educators seeking efficient, scalable localization solutions.
features: AI-powered dubbing enables seamless translation of video audio into over 40 languages, preserving tone and emotion for global audiences.
Voice cloning replicates a person’s voice with high accuracy, allowing personalized audio content without hiring voice actors.
Text-to-speech converts written scripts into natural, human-like voices in multiple languages, enhancing video and presentation quality.
Auto-generated subtitles provide accurate, time-synced captions in over 70 languages, improving accessibility and viewer engagement.
AI clip generator transforms long videos into short, engaging clips optimized for social media platforms.
AI video generator creates ready-to-share videos from scripts, complete with visuals, voiceovers, and subtitles.
Voice changer modifies voices with customizable styles and accents, adding expressiveness to audio content.
Integrations with platforms like YouTube and Vimeo streamline content uploading and management processes.
AI avatars create narrated avatar videos without filming, ideal for presentations and demos.
Browser-based access allows users to create and edit content from any device without software installation.

faqs.question: What is Wavel AI used for?
faqs.answer: Wavel AI is used for creating, dubbing, and localizing video and audio content with AI-powered tools like voice cloning, text-to-speech, and subtitling.

faqs.question: Does Wavel AI offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Wavel AI offers a free trial that allows users to test core features like dubbing and subtitling with limited credits.

faqs.question: How many languages does Wavel AI support?
faqs.answer: Wavel AI supports over 40 languages for dubbing and voiceovers and over 70 languages for subtitling.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my Wavel AI subscription?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can cancel their subscription via the account page, retaining access to premium features until the billing cycle ends.

faqs.question: What is the voice cloning feature?
faqs.answer: Voice cloning replicates a person’s voice with precision, enabling personalized audio for videos without requiring voice actors.

faqs.question: How accurate are Wavel AI’s subtitles?
faqs.answer: Wavel AI’s subtitles are auto-generated with up to 90% accuracy and are time-synced for seamless integration.

faqs.question: Can Wavel AI be used for educational content?
faqs.answer: Yes, Wavel AI supports e-learning by creating multilingual voiceovers and subtitles for immersive learning experiences.

faqs.question: Is coding knowledge required to use Wavel AI?
faqs.answer: No, Wavel AI is user-friendly and requires no coding knowledge, offering an intuitive interface for all users.
